original_text:
because you have ignored all my counsel
    and would have none of my reproof,
korean_text: 도리어 나의 모든 교훈을 멸시하며 나의 책망을 받지 아니하였은즉

sentences.original_text: because you have ignored all my counsel
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 나의 모든 충고를 무시했기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and would have none of my reproof
